html:
4.8.19  9:04 am   hi bill i have a new job starting with another company soon but i have to quit my current job. how do i tell my boss i'm leaving without burning the bridge?

     you could carefully deconstruct the bridge and set it in a safe place near by

4.8.19  7:43 am   How do I contact you for business inquiries?

     you could send an electronic message

4.8.19  7:41 am   Would you ever consider making music with someone else?

     sure

4.8.19  6:41 am   What exactly was the darn thing in the 3rd box in your unboxing video? 

     nothing (empty box)

4.8.19  6:40 am   Bill, I'm about to snap. I love drawing, but all my work has been sporadic and small.

I'm about to do a bigger project. I'm scared it's not going to turn out the way I want, and I barely know where I am going to start.

What's your advice for these situations?

           doing a medium sized project may be just the ticket, but if you really want to get to that larger project, just remember the golden rule which is that the 10th will be much better than the 1st, yet the 10th will not exist without the first. and the second rule is, doing bad work can also be fun. so get to it, and enjoy

4.8.19  6:21 am   Would you call yourself dank?

     no need to call myself

4.8.19  4:55 am   clouds are blanket sheets for the earth, change my mind 

     why

4.8.19  3:11 am   your opinion on anime?

     i mean,

4.8.19  2:56 am   Dear Sir William, can human duplicate duplicated thing ?

     that's not my name, but sure

4.8.19  2:22 am   Could ice be fire?

     no

4.8.19  1:55 am   do youlike clavinet

     it is good for scratching itches

4.8.19  1:38 am   :( you sound so sad in the reality video recorded on 5.17.16 11:47pm

     i was probably not, but you seem so sad in this question

4.8.19  12:50 am   unlimited bears?

     there's got to be a limit somewhere

4.7.19  11:50 pm   Fanfiction opinion?

     prefer fic fantion

4.7.19  11:47 pm   What's Obama's last name?

     niceguy

4.7.19  10:38 pm   what made you want to start doing the audio journal reality things?

     as a way of coaxing myself into success at a mountain-movingly hard project. in other words, if i do actually succeed in moving a mountain, the first hand documentary materials should surely be of very high value. so essentially by embarking on the journal project, i am now significantly amplifying the stakes of success, while also already feeling like i have a participatory leg in its success story. also serves as a remarkably good discussion/negotiation platform for the daily influx of zillions of conflicting strategies, and thus keeps me calm and organized during such conflict

4.7.19  10:19 pm   Is it more important to find something or someone on the earth to live for or to find something or someone outside of the earth to live for instead? Is it important to live for something or someone at all, or is time limited enough that it simply isn't worth it?

     you could live for the world, as the world lives for you

4.7.19  9:04 pm   It's absolutely peculiar to me that music piggybacks a lot of its aesthetic on speaking.

     seems like common sense to me

      Sad music has the same melodies someone might have if they were sad and talking, and same with happy music. If some musical melody sounds bad, It's probably because it's going against how you'd expect someone to talk. I wonder if there is any insight to be found for musical composition in the field of phonetics?

     of course. bring the phonetics in from the field, if possible. lay them on the desk right in front of you, while you work. bathe in phonetics

      this is just my opinion, it might be false

4.7.19  8:24 pm   do u like the word "shall"

     in moderation

4.7.19  8:11 pm   I JUST WANT TO MAKE MUSIC! why is everything so hard? T-T

     because it's too good

4.7.19  7:51 pm   what was the other purpose u made how to win at spellingfor

     just trying to put food on the table

4.7.19  7:38 pm   you're a pansy

     fair enough

4.7.19  7:04 pm   What is the best way to solve random depression?

     try listing the values in a spiral. sometimes patterns emerge there that were imperceptible before

4.7.19  6:57 pm   do you think it is possible to learn the drums without having a physical drum set?

     somewhat

4.7.19  6:46 pm   Do you think people writing fan fiction about you is creepy?

     yes

      I think your subreddit is having a bit of an argument over this

     i don't have a subreddit

4.7.19  6:45 pm   I've been playing piano for a while and I want to be able to improvise but chords are funky and weird and I can't seem to be able to come up with stuff on the spot. Do you have any tips for what I can do to become better at it?

     SONG

4.7.19  6:45 pm   ever wonder why the hell we function the way we do 

     usually i change it and then wonder why i function that new way. (etc)

4.7.19  6:43 pm   how are you able to answer these as 2:00 AM

     questions submitted at 2:00 AM have a special 'answerable' quality to them. it actually doesn't matter what time i answer a question submitted at 2:00 AM, it will still display as a 2:00 AM question

4.7.19  6:27 pm   Thoughts about geology?

     it only counts if you go all the way, times 2^n

4.7.19  6:18 pm   do you ever just remember and forget the meaning of life at the same time

     forget and remember

4.7.19  6:10 pm   I just got back from a trip to New York and now I'm depressed about having to go back to the boring, everyday life. What can I do to help?

     congratulations, you have newyorkitis now. your only hope is to move there for the rest of your life

4.7.19  6:08 pm   how much do you enjoy using exclamation marks

     not very much

4.7.19  5:41 pm   I went through expert mode looking at your old pictures and other stuff from 2009-mid 2014, and you respectfully seemed to have no sanity left. Thoughts?

     how do you explain this

4.7.19  5:37 pm   i was going to ask you a question but i forgot what it was

     i forgot what the answer was

4.7.19  5:24 pm   to my ear the "here's a poem about rain" section of when i get older and the "and the road doesn't end" section of long journey sound similar, in context at least, is there something they have in common either musically or in terms of influence that you're aware of,

     yes

      i can't really pick it out. i am also curious if the fact these were consecutive songs plays into some larger narrative or if you just liked that sound that month

     habits

4.7.19  5:05 pm   whats the best way to legally shut down a college? 

     coax its community unassumingly into some scandals

4.7.19  5:02 pm   do you enjoy punk rock?

     no rock is truly punk enough

4.7.19  3:31 pm   Do songs ever get stuck in your head?

     yes

      How do you let them out

     the only remedy is another song

4.7.19  2:58 pm   have you ever considered selling albums?

     yes

     if not, have you ever considered giving away albums for free?

     yes

4.7.19  2:43 pm   should i just do the thing

     what thing, i was not informed of thing

4.7.19  2:37 pm   should I stop writing on my arm

     try the other arm

4.7.19  2:33 pm   if u could visit any place at any time - where... and when 

     i would visit as many places at as many times as possible

4.7.19  2:31 pm   Hey Bill, i'm super interested in what your 'length regulation system' was/is all about.  Do you mind elaborating on it?  

     when i had a release schedule but no requirements on how long each piece should be, it was an attempt to set lower limits on the total length of material that must be released, on a weekly or monthly basis. never ended up finding a solution

4.7.19  2:09 pm   Why Earth 

     it's all because of you

4.7.19  1:31 pm   should we find meaning in everything, or should meaning be everything?

     according to the rulebook, (which has meaning), everything means something

4.7.19  1:31 pm   Are you interested in quantum physics?

     i am simultaneously interested and uninterested

4.7.19  1:30 pm   what's your opinions on ranch as a dip

     too dippy, and somehow not dippy enough

4.7.19  1:26 pm   where do you think you belong?

     right, where i'm

4.7.19  1:06 pm   i duplicated some hexagons, what do you think of them?

     nothing, because i think you forgot to show them to me. did not perceive the hexagons

4.7.19  12:37 pm   how do you prefer your waves to be propagated

     al ways
